title: Brunch & Bubbles at Belvedere Room
description: Because brunch pairs best with bubbles, every Sunday in the Belvedere Room at The Padre we're serving up free flowing champagne with a buffet of all your brunch faves from 9am to 2pm. $29 adults // $13 children (12 & under)
short_description: Because brunch pairs best with bubbles, every Sunday in the Belvedere Room at The Padre we're serving up free flowing champagne with a buffet of all your brunch faves from 9am to 2pm
